title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 215.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 215.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part provides for the implementation of payment of a
training stipend to volunteer firefighters for the completion of certain
training. The Office of Fire Prevention and Control is authorized to administer
and award training stipends to volunteer firefighters for completion of certain
firefighter training, subject to available state funding. In addition, volunteer fire departments are authorized to pay volunteer firefighters a
training stipend, subject to available local funding, for the completion of
certain courses, identified by the Office of Fire Prevention and

Control. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
215.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 6, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 10, eff. 3/6/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
